Class QueryExecutingTag

java.lang.Object

          net.ontopia.topicmaps.nav2.taglibs.tolog.QueryExecutingTag
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
IfTag, SetTag
public abstract class QueryExecutingTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport

INTERNAL: Generic Tolog Tag that has support for executing one query.

See Also:

Method Detail

doStartTag

public int doStartTag()
               throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspTagException
Process the start tag for this instance. Post: queryResult and columnNames have values, but nothing is done to them. It is up to the child class to make use of these. Returns EVAL_BODY_BUFFERED by default.

Specified by:
doStartTag in interface javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
Overrides:
doStartTag in class javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspTagException

public int doAfterBody()
                throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspTagException
